name: Subway Surfers Mod
description: DASH as fast as you can! DODGE the oncoming trains! Help Jake, Tricky & Fresh escape from the grumpy Inspector and his dog. ★ Grind trains with your cool crew! ★ Colorful and vivid HD graphics! ★ Hoverboard Surfing! ★ Paint powered jetpack! ★ Lightning fast swipe acrobatics! ★ Challenge and help your friends! Join the most daring chase! A Universal App with HD optimized graphics.By Kiloo and Sybo. This project is free or donation meaning you may dowload it for free but we do accept donations, we would really appriciate the people that donate and take the time to try our mods.
